recipe_name: Madeira cake with mulled wine sauce
author: Brian Turner
method: Place the red wine with the spices, cherry juice, sugar, orange zest and orange juice into a saucepan over a high heat. Bring to the boil and then reduce the heat to simmer for ten minutes until the liquid has reduced by a half. To serve, pour the mulled wine into a bowl and top with slices of Madeira cake.
ingredients: 140ml/5fl oz red wine ,  pinch ground cinnamon ,  pinch ground ginger ,  100ml/3½fl oz cherry juice from a tin ,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  ½ orange, zest only,  1 orange, juice only,  3 slices of ready-made Madeira cake
